text: I'm already proficient in PHP and Javascript, but for a project a client is insisting that it be done in Python instead.
Its a good opportunity, so I've agreed to learn Python.

lis.text: How easy/hard will it be to  build AJAX powered web applications in Python compared to PHP
what are the main differences in the two languages?
Any good resources for learning web development in Python?

text: All other information will of course be helpful as well.
